Title: Mr. Church
Overview: A unique friendship develops when a little girl and her dying mother inherit a cook - Mr. Church. What begins as an arrangement that should only last six months, instead spans fifteen years.
Tagline: He was the one person she could always count on.
production_companies: Envision Media Arts, Cinelou Films, Shenghua Entertainment
Cast: Eddie Murphy, Britt Robertson, Natascha McElhone
